And no, I don't think the incest invalidates that sentiment. This is literally the only incest doujin by this author (that I could find), and it's not uncommon for people to use something that they dislike in order to drive a point home through fictional media.

I honestly wouldn't be surprised if the author of this doujin is a rare Japanese feminist who woke up one day filled with rage against the Japanese society and decided to vent that anger by drawing this. I genuinely have nothing against the subject matter. Even though I don't fantasize about getting raped by women, I can sadistically enjoy watching it unfold. My issue is how preachy the "message" is, and I'm talking about the last page. First the author writes that things were strange "in the past," but then the fourth wall is broken with "current era." That's social commentary no matter how you slice it. The doujin takes the concept of gender roles and extrapolates it to the absolute extreme, then takes a jab at our Society™ in the last page. While I don't think the author is trying to change the world with drawings fucking each other, I also don't think it's reasonable to mock those who feel like there's an agenda here. The message is there, and it's preachy as fuck.

@SlutSlayer007 It sure is fucked up, it's pro-incest. Futa on male is normally cursed on its own right, anyway. The only reason why I favorite said cursed futa on male doujins is because I want to see how genuinely fucked up said genre can be, and it never fails to disappoint in that regard. We not only get incest, we also get pedophilia.

TL;DR There is no "agenda" here to begin with. It's just another fetish fantasy from another fetish artist, simple as that.  His other works tell us the exact same thing. And if you *do* support this doujin's pro-incest message, I hope Chris Hansen finds you. Better yet the FBI, like for real.

Let me get this straight, so apparently the "happier" future that this doujin is implying is some fetishized reversal of the 1950's, coupled with incest being a-ok. For those below, this doujin isn't some "feminist" agenda, it's just some fetish fantasy made by the author. It's showing less of an "agenda" and more showing how much the artist is jerking off to the idea of being treated like a second class citizen. And for those who unironically support this doujin's message even though it literally paints incest as "good," shut up and go get some help.

This feels a lot like it was made just to push a radical feminist agenda, and if anything, it makes it more likely that people will hate feminism. I'm not into yaoi or guro or that sort of stuff, but by the end I was hoping for the father and son to smash the mother and daughter's faces in with lead pipes, and then impregnate each other and form a micronation with other men exclusively comprised of men.

And ignoring that, it isn't even a very hot doujin. The art is mediocre at best, and the censor job uses so many black bars that they might as well fully white it out. If I was IGN I would give this a 6/10, and if I was anyone else I would give this a 2/10. The only reason I wouldn't give it a 1/10 is cause it can teach people why they shouldn't push for radical feminism.
